about_the_game:
• Story


In a world where many races live together peacefully. One day, a crack appeared in the sky, and with a loud bang, the crack turned into a large black hole, from which many magical particles shot out and hit people. The clothes of those who got hit changed and became like a mosaic. To save them, a young witch and her familiar appeared.

• Gameplay


Hit the energy balls to destroy the mosaic! Use your mouse to play, move your wand left and right to control it, right click to charge magic power and left click to fire thunder magic when you've charged up your magic power!
Clear all the mosaics! Be careful not to miss the energy ball and hurt yourself!

• Items


Sometimes breaking mosaic tiles will drop magic items, collect those useful tools to destroy the mosaic! But be careful! Some magic items may have negative effects.

• Skill Enhancement System


On your adventure to destroy the mosaic, the protagonist will grow stronger. Use these skill points to become proficient in various magic elements!

• Lots of Characters


There are cute adventurers all over the world who need the protagonist to save them. Come and strip... I mean, eliminate the mosaic on those 10 poor adventurers!

• Black Shadow mode


Stripping naked isn’t enough? The naked adventurers are now attacked by monsters and got cursed with mosaic AGAIN!! The mosaic must be cleansed!

• Boss levels


Unanimated CGs feels a bit lackluster? Aside from regular levels, there are also boss levels with animated CGs! Not only that the CGs are animated, you also get to earn more skill points!

• Gallery


"There are various features in the gallery to help you better “enjoy” the CGs! In addition to the level content, the more heart points you have left when clearing a level, the more CGs you'll unlock! With over 80 CGs, 5 animated CGs, and many more variants, there's plenty for you to enjoy!"

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, BDSM, bestiality,General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.

• Story

name: Destroy! Mosaic!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 compatible graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: This is a simple & fun fantasy-style brick-breaking game with refined character CGs. The clothes of various adventurers have been turned into mosaics due to a curse! Use your magic to destroy these mosaics (and their clothes)!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
